com.cmput301.recipebot.model.network

Class ESClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301.recipebot.model.network.ESClient

  • public class ESClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The client class that communicates with our backend. It uses an instance of Gson to serialize and deserialize data.

      • searchRecipes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Recipe> searchRecipes(java.util.ArrayList<Ingredient> ingredients,
                                        boolean matchAll)
        Search for all recipes with the given Ingredients. It only searches by the name of the ingredient, not its units or quantity.
        Parameters:
        ingredients - The ingredients to search for.
        matchAll - Whether to only show recipes that have every ingredient.
        Returns:
        List of recipes that have these ingredients.
